mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userUUID, token, id, pw, nickname, email, birthday, regTime) VALUES (UNHEX(REPLACE(UUID(), '-', '')), #{token}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{birthday}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT token FROM user where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1) as count
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE email = #{email} LIMIT 1) as count
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE nickname = #{nickname} LIMIT 1) as count
SELECT id FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE User SET pw = #{pw} WHERE email = #{email} and id = #{id}
SELECT id, nickname, email, birthday, profileImgUrl FROM user WHERE token = #{token}
